properties.name: Atlanta
properties.notes:
Hey gang, this month, after 2 years away, we're planning to go back to Taco Mac at the Prado in Sandy Springs, on Roswell Rd, just inside the Perimeter. Look for us in the covered outdoor section after 6:30PM. Double check our FB page in case of any last minute changes.

https://www.facebook.com/PuzzledPintAtlanta/

Hope to see you in person!

properties.name: Auckland
properties.address: 179 Mt Albert Rd, Mt Albert, AUK
properties.notes: Please RSVP using the Google Form https://forms.gle/hzgQWRS54wCuzKQS8 by Sunday evening!

properties.name: Austin
properties.address: 7010 Easy Wind Drive, Suite 150, Austin, TX 78752
properties.notes: We are starting to run into capacity limits with the regular patrons, so we request that you reserve your space for Tuesday. You can do this at the Vigilante website or by calling them. This isn't mandatory, but will ensure your team has seating when you arrive.

properties.name: Bay Area - San Francisco
properties.notes:
San Francisco game control volunteers will be hosting Puzzled Pint at two San Francisco locations again this month from 6pm to 9pm. Come puzzle with us at either venue.

The Napper Tandy at 3200 24th Street in the Mission District

Enjoy Irish pub food, drinks, and ambiance along with your puzzles at The Napper Tandy. Ample outdoor and indoor seating options. Look for game control outside by the door to pick up a puzzle set.

OR

Willkommen at 2198 Market Street in Castro/Hayes Valley

Solve your puzzles with us over craft beers and German-American food at the Willkommen beer hall. Features both indoor and outdoor seating, though the outdoor table surface may be somewhat less conducive to puzzling. Consider bringing a good writing surface if you prefer the outdoor option; we'll try to have some on hand to loan. Note that this location closes at 9pm, so we won't be able to stay beyond that.

properties.name: Boston
properties.notes:
The forecast looks good so we're outdoors in Davis Square again this month! GC will be at a table near JP Licks / Boston Burger. There are a few places nearby where tacos can be had...

Please let us know at https://pp-rsvp.com/A5L53Q by Monday if you plan to attend so we can print appropriately.

Scissors (and tape, if you solve outside) are useful for this set.

properties.name: Boulder
properties.notes:
PLEASE NOTE: There are multiple Murphy's in Boulder County - we're meeting at the one in Louisville!

We don't have a reserved section - just let the host stand know that you're here for Puzzled Pint and would like a table. Once you're seated, come find us and let us know you're here!

properties.name: Brno
properties.notes: Write to Yeti (yeti@physics.muni.cz) if you plan to come (I will be offline for the extended weekend so do not expect a timely response). If you want a reservation, make one yourself. Thanks!

properties.name: Cape Town
properties.notes: No event this month

properties.name: Central NJ
properties.notes: Tacos, tacos, tacos...

properties.name: Charlottesville
properties.bar: Brazos Tacos at IX Art Park
properties.notes:
Brazos Tacos at the IX Art Park.

Note that this is the original Brazos, NOT the new Brazos location on Emmet St (which is awaiting its liquor license as of this writing).

We're also starting at 5:30 as Brazos closes at 8 on Tuesdays, though they leave the lights on outside over the patio for solvers who want to stay past 8. You can still show up at 6 or later if you want.

Feel free to bring chairs and a blanket and hang out on the grass too if you prefer! You can also bring your own food if you sit in the park, or take the puzzles to the nearby Three Notched Brewery or anywhere else if you want.

Please RSVP at puzzledpintcho@gmail.com if you're definitely or probably coming.

properties.name: Chicago - City North
properties.address: 3403 N Damen Ave, City North, IL 60657
properties.notes:
Come celebrate the long-awaited end of winter at The Reveler (note the last-minute location change!)

RSVP: https://pp-rsvp.com/ZX7NBQ

properties.name: Chicago - City South
properties.notes: RSVP here for Marz: https://www.tickettailor.com/events/puzzledpintchicago/910057

properties.name: Christchurch
properties.notes:
This month we're meeting at Muy Muy! The theme of the month is Taco Tuesday so we really looked for a suitable venue that serves tacos :D

As usual, please book your tables online https://www.muymuy.co.nz/ and specify you're with Puzzled Pint.

Happy puzzling!

properties.name: Columbia, Maryland
properties.notes:
Looking forward to seeing everyone!

Scissors are needed and tape is helpful. As always, GC will have some supplies for those who need it.

properties.name: Coventry
properties.address: Medieval Spon Street, Coventry, COV CV1 3BA
properties.notes: Look for our Puzzled Pint Game Control sign.

properties.name: DFW - zzz - Ft. Worth/Arlington
properties.address: 2420 W Park Row Dr, Pantego, TX
properties.notes: This will be our last Puzzled Pint for Ft. Worth/Arlington. There's a chapter in Dallas we encourage DFW folks to support going forward.

properties.name: Denver
properties.notes:
*Starting at 6:30 as usual (not at 6). Sorry for the confusion!!

Kid friendly! Dog friendly! Indoor and outdoor seating! See you there!

Make sure you go to the Downing Street location (near DU), and not one of their others.

properties.name: Detroit Metro
properties.notes: There's a 50% off special on Tuesdays, it might be a bit busy!

properties.name: Edinburgh
properties.notes:
Come join us at the Fountainbridge Fox! We'll be in a booth round behind the bar.

Sadly not a pub which sells tacos to fit with the set theme, but there don't seem to be many of those in Edinburgh.

As always, please have one person from your group send us a quick RSVP to PuzzPintEdi@protonmail.com so we know how many puzzle sets to print out.

properties.name: Galway City
properties.address: 3 William Street west, Galway, C H91V184

properties.name: Houston
properties.notes: Find us in the massive taproom! Look for our Puzzled Pint table sign.

properties.name: Huntsville
properties.address: 2620 Clinton Ave W Suite B, Huntsville, AL 35801
properties.notes:
Come grab a taco and enjoy our Taco Tuesday puzzle set! We will be set up inside right when you walk in.

For more info, visit us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PuzzPintHSV or Twitter: https://twitter.com/PuzzPintHSV

properties.name: Jersey City/Hoboken
properties.notes:
We're heading over to Jersey City for our next round! Come stop by Grace O'Malleys for a nice round of puzzles and a beer (or two)!

Check us out as well on instagram to stay up to date on events- @PUZZLEDPINTHUDSONCOUNTY

properties.name: Kansas City
properties.notes: Cory is gone again this month so I picked a place a little closer to home that we haven't tried yet. Right off 87th and I-435 in Lenexa. They close at 9, so I'll probably wrap things up at 8:30. It's another food quart type place with a pizza place, bar, and burger place. I left the start time at 6 but I'll be there by 5:30 to get dinner if anyone wants to start earlier.

properties.name: Kitchener-Waterloo
properties.notes:
RSVP to travisandhanna@gmail.com by Monday night so we can give an update to the bar and know how many sets to print!

We'll be in the Jazz Room - just let the staff know you're there for Puzzled Pint and they'll direct you to the right spot.

properties.name: London
properties.notes:
At the moment Puzzled Pint London is still running remotely. You're encouraged to join your friends in a video call and solve Puzzled Pint together.

We'll be running the event through our online tool at https://puzzledpint.live/.

You can download the puzzles and check your answers from 7pm on Tuesday

GC will be available to help on request too

properties.name: Los Angeles - Inland Empire
properties.notes: RSVP by sending a Facebook message to www.facebook.com/PuzzledPintIE. True to theme, there will be a taco truck on site!

properties.name: Los Angeles - Northeast
properties.bar: Kitchen on San Fernando (inside the Hilton Garden Inn)
properties.address: 401 S San Fernando Blvd, Burbank, CA 91505
properties.notes:
Kitchen on San Fernando is the restaurant/bar in the lobby at the Hilton Garden Inn in Downtown Burbank.

This is free parking underground! The sign says $20, but that is only for overnight parking. There is also streeting parking.

Happy hour is from 4-6pm so feel free to arrive early if you want!

Jake and Steph will try and get there around 6pm :)

Note: Scissors are required for one puzzle this week. Please bring a pair of scissors if you have them.

properties.name: Los Angeles - Santa Monica
properties.address: 2455 Santa Monica Blvd, Santa Monica, CA 90404
properties.notes:
It's Taco Tuesday! At a pizza place. [crickets]

That's okay because this is one of our favorite spots. Friendly people, plenty of light, nice big tables. We'll see you there! And maybe bring a pair of scissors if you have one?

If you want to join our Discord to be notified of upcoming stuff: https://discord.gg/r9xy45Tas4

Or, if you prefer Facebook, we have a Facebook group! https://www.facebook.com/groups/puzzledpintwla

properties.name: Madison
properties.notes: RSVPs are optional but appreciated: if you RSVP for your team at gc.madisonpuzzles.com by Tuesday morning, we will be sure to set aside a puzzle set for you. (We will also bring extra sets, so please come even if you haven't RSVP'd!)

properties.name: Manchester
properties.notes:
We're back at an old favourite: The Horse and Jockey in Chorlton!

As usual, if you're coming as a team, you can start any time from 7:00. If you're coming alone then please arrive by 7:30 and we will find you a team to join.

properties.name: Melbourne
properties.notes:
We will be seated in the back

Please RSVP here so we know numbers: https://pp-rsvp.com/3T2PEE

Note that there are three Taco Bill locations in the CBD - we are in the Bourke St one, close to Parliament Station

properties.name: Missoula
properties.notes: Join us for Taco Tuesday from 6-9 pm!

properties.name: Montreal
properties.notes: Please RSVP here if you can: https://www.facebook.com/events/6668230089871790

properties.name: Nashville
properties.notes:
We are back in a bar. Come visit, and RSVP to be sure you get a puzzle set. RSVP at https://forms.gle/13xrcZR3EUDQNGiD9

Look for the Puzzled Pint logo on the table near the door.

properties.name: New York City
properties.address: 300 W 40th St, New York City, NY 10018
properties.notes: Back at Beer Authority this month after a good turnout last month. We will have some covered outdoor seating available if you're into it.

properties.name: Norwich
properties.notes: Call the pub on 01603 464461 if you want to book a table.

properties.name: Orange County
properties.notes:
This month we're headed back to Golden Road in Anaheim. (There is an Angels game that night, so it may be busy at first, but should clear out later. Also it's ginormous.)

Please RSVP here so we know how many sets to bring:
https://pp-rsvp.com/CMFX9C

See you soon!

properties.name: Ottawa
properties.notes:
Picking this place based on theme - there's a taco tour special going on at Lone Star ! Mmmm

Please let us know you're coming by getting free tickets on eventbrite - it helps us know how many puzzles to print!

Kevin and Steph

properties.name: Philadelphia
properties.notes: We will be in the dining area to the left as you enter - check in with the host and they will walk you over.  There may be outside seating if it's warm enough.  See all then!

properties.name: Phoenix
properties.notes:
Bring your favorite puzzle solving tools and toys (pencil, eraser, scissors, straight-edge, or whatever).

Trying another new place! Look for Mitchell.

Indoor and outdoor tables.

properties.name: Pittsburgh
properties.notes: Join us for Taco Tuesday at Cinderlands Warehouse in the Strip District! What better way to kick off this taco-themed puzzle set? Nearby street parking is free after 6pm. There are also paid parking lots and garages.

properties.name: Portland, Maine
properties.notes: Not sure if this place is new or I've just never noticed it, but either way happy to find another place in the Old Port with outdoor seating!

properties.name: Portland, Oregon
properties.address: 1305 SE 8TH AVE & MAIN, Portland, Oregon, OR 97214

properties.name: Prague
properties.notes:
The pub does not accept payment cards.

Please fill the RSVP form at https://puzzledpint.sifrovacky.cz/praha.html

properties.name: Raleigh-Durham
properties.bar: The Glass Jug Beer Lab - Downtown Durham
properties.notes:
Looking forward to the May edition of Raleigh-Durham Puzzled Pint!

We'll be at the Downtown Durham Glass Jug location (note: NOT the RTP location) from 6-9pm.

Kindly mark yourself as "going" on our Facebook event if you plan on attending - it helps us know how many puzzle sets to print!

properties.name: Seattle - City
properties.notes:
We're running two simultaneous events in Seattle! Please follow the link below to RSVP for the location you will attend:

  • TS McHughs, Uptown at 21 Mercer St (Apple / Google)
    Please plan to arrive a little later than usual, around 6:30, at this location to avoid a crowd from the Stanley Cup Playoffs being held at the nearby Climate Pledge Arena.
  • Dreamland Bar & Diner, Fremont at 3401 Evanston Ave N (Apple / Google)
    We'll be available a little earlier at this location, starting at 5:30, if you want to catch Happy Hour before 6:00.

RSVP (once per team) here: https://www.eventbrite.com/e/puzzled-pint-seattle-may-2023-tickets-630587824157

(One location may fill up sooner than the other, and we only have enough packets printed for those who register, so be sure to RSVP as early as possible.)

If you're interested, join the Puzzled Pint Seattle Discord server!

Running two events takes a lot of volunteers! Please talk to us if you're interested in joining the Game Control team.

properties.name: St. Louis
properties.notes:
TACO TUESDAY! So, Mission Taco is a great spot, and though I wanted to take it downtown this month, the downtown Taco places all said their locations were too ... Oh well. We'll be sure to move it around more in the next few months.

As always, please RSVP to the FB event (one per team) or email me Subject: "We're coming to PP!"

properties.name: Stafford
properties.notes:
Family Friendly! And Buffalo Wild Wings has some yummy tacos!

See you there!

properties.name: Sydney
properties.notes:
As you enter the venue walk straight ahead and down the stairs, we have reserved the whole room at the very back of the venue all for us!

Please bring your own stationery if possible, however we will have things to lend out!

Please like and share our facebook page and leave us a review!

properties.name: Syracuse
properties.notes: Look for the Puzzled Pint table tent to pick up puzzles for your team - Game Control will be available with puzzles and hints from 6-9PM! You can also find out more about the Evergreen's Taco Tuesday specials here: https://www.evergreensyr.com/weeklyspecials

properties.name: Toronto
properties.notes:
Looking forward to seeing everyone this Tuesday, May 9, 2023.

We will be set up at our GC table to help with the puzzles from 6:00 - 9:00 PM

Please join us in the Discord between events for other puzzle-related fun!

Puzzled Pint Toronto is currently overseen by: Michaela and Stu at the GC table and Andria for venue booking and social media

properties.name: Tulsa
properties.notes: For a Taco Tuesday-themed Puzzled Pint, we needed to go somewhere with tacos. We'll be at the Rabbit Hole Bar and Grill from 6:00-9:00. Look for the Puzzled Pint table toppers. The street parking out front is free in the evenings, or you can find paid lots near McNellie's or Yokozuna. We can't wait to see you there! -Cassie and Alex

properties.name: Twin Cities
properties.notes:
La Doña is a brewery with an in-house restaurant that serves tacos and taco-adjacent foods. 🌮 🍻 Live it up on Taco Tuesday! There are a few tables outside.

They have a parking lot that usually fills up, so if you drive you can look there first but you may need to opt for street parking. The number 9 bus goes quite near the brewery. They have a bike rack.

Please RSVP here by midnight Monday so we can print a packet for your team: https://pp-rsvp.com/HP3JVC ☀️

properties.name: Valencia
properties.address: Carrer del Dr. Ferran, 10, Valencia, V 46021
properties.notes:
Join the group on Telegram to stay up to date: https://t.me/puzzledpintvlc

Arrive by 2030 if you want to be placed in a team or arrive at any time before 2130 if you have your own team. We will be there until midnight. The puzzles usually take our teams around 2 hours to complete. Not a problem to come alone, you can complete the puzzles solo or we can help you find a team if you would like one. Ask for the Puzzled Pint and/or the Board Games group. We will occupy both 'sides' of the bar.

properties.name: Victoria
properties.notes:
Back to the Moon Under Water - please RSVP per team to chris@enigmaticevents.com. Also please email us if you'd like to be put back on to our reminder email list.

We will have one side of the bar reserved for us until about 7.15. Look for the Yellow table sign for the puzzle packs!

properties.name: Washington - Arlington/City
properties.notes:
Washington DC-City/Arlington will be back again at Spider Kelly's in Clarendon. Enjoy special Taco Tuesday rates this month! If you are planning to attend, please RSVP to puzzledpintdc@gmail.com so we know how many teams to expect and sets to print.

Also, if interested in more puzzling fun, DCPHR will be running a puzzle hunt on Saturday, May 13. See https://www.eventbrite.com/e/a-lighter-dcphr-gold-rush-2023-tickets-580736497497 for more information. Have questions? Let us know at puzzledpintdc@gmail.com.

properties.name: Wellington
properties.notes:
Hello Puzzlers! This month we are trialling a sign-up form, see here - https://pp-rsvp.com/6RM6JT
We only need one person to sign up per team, try give your best estimate for the size of your team.

This month we are hosted at El Barrio on Dixon street - upstairs from Eva Beva.

This month it will be handy to have some scissors with you. We'll have a few spare pairs in case you forget, but they are small and annoying to use so bring your own!

properties.name: Windsor
properties.address: 1898 Shepherd St E, Windsor, ON N8Y 1T5

properties.name: Zurich
properties.notes: This month we're at The Alehouse – Palmhof just up the road from ETH Zentrum (nearest tram stop is ETH/Universitätsspital). See you there!
